ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Three
ComicInfo.Summary:
Edwina’s attempt to control Edward’s legacy leaves Violet with a difficult decision to make. But even with the help of some unlikely allies, can she find the strength to do the right thing—or even figure out what the right thing is?
The conclusion of the three-issue occult family drama!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jason Federhenn (a) & Josh Burcham (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Jen Bartel | 2 | Note: The digital edition (1/24/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 15:58:09. [CVDB655357]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jason Federhenn, Jen Bartel, Josh Burcham
